title: Enhancing Practical Machine Learning Competencies: Gamification-Based Escape Rooms for Improving Patient Safety and Teamwork

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Identify patient safety risk factors with 80% accuracy and establish risk management strategies through mathematical analysis
Learners collaboratively solve three or more complex problems within an escape game using teamwork within 30 minutes
Learners can visualize patient safety protocol data (graphs/charts) and submit it in the form of a team-based report
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
